flavorText: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

foreignData.flavorText: Sein Urteil lautet immer auf schuldig. Die Strafe lautet immer Tod.
foreignData.name: Schlächter von Malakir
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn der Schlächter von Malakir oder eine andere Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, opfern alle Gegner eine Kreatur.

foreignData.flavorText: Su veredicto siempre es culpable. Su sentencia siempre es la muerte.
foreignData.name: Carnicero de Malakir
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que el Carnicero de Malakir u otra criatura que controles vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla, cada oponente sacrifica una criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: Son verdict est toujours coupable. Sa sentence est toujours la mort.
foreignData.name: Boucher de Malakir
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que le Boucher de Malakir ou qu'une autre créature que vous contrôlez est mis dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, chaque adversaire sacrifie une créature.

foreignData.flavorText: Il suo verdetto? Colpevole. La sua sentenza? Morte.
foreignData.name: Macellaio di Malakir
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta il Macellaio di Malakir o un'altra creatura che controlli viene messa in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia, ogni avversario sacrifica una creatura.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼の判決は常に有罪だ。 彼の量刑は常に死刑だ。
foreignData.name: マラキールの解体者
foreignData.text:
飛行
マラキールの解体者かあなたがコントロールする他のクリーチャーが１体戦場からいずれかの墓地に置かれるたび、各対戦相手はクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: Seu veredito é sempre o de culpado. Sua sentença é sempre de morte.
foreignData.name: Carniceiro de Malakir
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que Carniceiro de Malakir ou outra criatura que você controla for colocado num cemitério vindo do campo de batalha, cada oponente sacrifica uma criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: У него всегда один и тот же вердикт: виновен. И один и тот же приговор: смерть.
foreignData.name: Малакирский Мясник
foreignData.text:
Полет
Каждый раз когда Малакирский Мясник или другое существо под вашим контролем попадает с поля битвы на кладбище, каждый оппонент жертвует по одному существу.

foreignData.flavorText: 他永远判定有罪。 他总是裁决处死。
foreignData.name: 马拉奇屠夫
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当马拉奇屠夫或由你操控的另一个生物从战场进入坟墓场时，每位对手便牺牲一个生物。

name: Butcher of Malakir
originalText:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

rulings.text: When the triggered ability resolves, first the player whose turn it is (if that player is an opponent) chooses which creature they will sacrifice, then each other opponent in turn order does the same, then all chosen creatures are sacrificed at the same time.

If multiple creatures you control (possibly including Butcher of Malakir itself) are put into their owners' graveyards at the same time, Butcher of Malakir's triggered ability will trigger that many times.

If you control more than one Butcher of Malakir and a creature you control is put into a graveyard, each of those Butchers' abilities will trigger. Each opponent will sacrifice a creature each time one of those abilities resolves.

If you and an opponent each control a Butcher of Malakir and a creature is put into a graveyard, a chain reaction happens. First the ability of one player's Butcher will trigger, causing each opponent to sacrifice a creature. That sacrifice causes the ability of the other player's Butcher to trigger, and so on.

text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
